mdRecord.dcterms:title: Electrotherapy apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: J.H Bunnell & Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: wood and wood products; metal; wire; leather [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: New No. 4 D.D Home medical apparatus with standard dry cell battery, by J.H Bunnell & Company of 76 Cortland Street, New York. Apparatus includes 2 handles, 2 electrode disks, 2 cylinders, 2 electrode wires, electrode plate, dry cell battery, and printed directions.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Electrotherapeutics
